thread.title: EXCLUSIVE: Rabiu Mohammed ruled out of Ghana's friendly against Canada due to injury
thread.title_full: EXCLUSIVE: Rabiu Mohammed ruled out of Ghana's friendly against Canada due to injury

title: EXCLUSIVE: Rabiu Mohammed ruled out of Ghana's friendly against Canada due to injury
text:
Sports News | 7 October 2015 21:55 CET EXCLUSIVE: Rabiu Mohammed ruled out of Ghana's friendly against Canada due to injury - www.ghanasoccernet.com Rabiu Mohammed 
Ghana midfielder Rabiu Mohammed has been ruld out of his country's international friendly against Canada next week due to injury, GHANAsoccernet.com can exclusively reveal. 
Mohammed, 25, picked up a knoc during Kuban Krasnodar 's 1-1 stalemate against Anzhi over the weekend. 
For more Ghana football news visit www.ghanasoccernet.com
